instructions:
Bring water to a boil in 3-quart saucepan. Stir in Knorr(R) Asian Sides(TM) - Chicken Fried Rice and vegetables; return to a boil.
Reduce heat and simmer covered 7 minutes or until rice is tender.
Stir in chicken; heat through. Let stand about 2 minutes.
title: Weekday Skillet Chicken
ingredients: 1 (5.7 ounce) package Knorr® Asian Sides™ - Chicken Fried Rice
1 cup frozen or drained canned vegetables
